response:
My dearest wife,

I have been thinking about our relationship and the words that describe it. Here are my thoughts:

Alluring - Light
Delight - Dark
Fantastic - Light
Fellowship - Light
Pretty - Light
Relish - Dark
Thrill - Light
Cherish - Light
Catastrophic - Dark
Furious - Dark
Filthy - Dark
Bad - Dark
Mourning - Dark
Terrifying - Dark
Dismal - Dark
Egotistical - Dark

I hope this helps us understand each other better.

Yours always,
Your wife

My dearest,

3. Fantastic - Light

5. Pretty - Light
6. Relish - Light

8. Cherish - Light
9. Catastrophic - Dark
10. Furious - Dark

13. Mourning - Dark

I eagerly await your responses, my love.

Yours always,

Your wife
